thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Growth Funds Dominated in 2017

author: Suzanne McGee
title: Growth Funds Dominated in 2017
text:
Growth, growth, growth.
In 2017, that’s all that a mutual-fund manager needed to pursue to reap a healthy return for investors.
The year was “one of the few times that we have seen synchronized global growth, while interest rates remain near their historic lows,” says Andrew Peck, manager of Baron Asset Fund, which posted a 26% gain in 2017....
